example.name: agentive adjectival
example.text: Western European leaders who favor speedy economic and monetary union are adding a new argument to their arsenal: the dizzying political changes under way in Eastern Europe.

example.name: all args
example.text: John was dizzied *trace* by Mary's rapid switches between loving tenderness and brutal violence.
